detail_desc: Sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a flounced hem with a double flounce at the front. Lined.
Swim top with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front with a long tab, long raglan sleeves and an elasticated hem.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a turtle neck and long sleeves with slits at the cuffs.
Pull-on jeans in supersoft denim with a drawstring waist, side pockets and back pockets. Zip fly with a press-stud and slim legs with straight hems.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an intarsia motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight legs.

Short, sleeveless dress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck with a tie detail and small opening at the front. Concealed zip in one side, and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in felted fabric with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Jumper in an extra-soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a roll-edge neckline, button on one shoulder and narrow ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Longer shirt in a crêpe weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a soft, detachable belt with metal rings, and buttoned cuffs.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, a scalloped neckline and short puff sleeves with a scalloped edge.
Short-sleeved, organic cotton polo shirt with a ribbed collar, button placket and narrow ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back with slits in the sides.

Oversized jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem.

Short dress in jersey crêpe with a collar, decorative opening at the front and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist, side pockets, detachable tie belt and tapered legs.

Short, cold shoulder dress in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and flounces that go over the arms held in place by narrow elastication. Sewn-in wrapover with a concealed press-stud at the neckline. Seam at the waist with narrow elastication at the back, and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with open heels and an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Playsuit in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, elasticated seam at the waist, diagonal side pockets and short legs.
Top in woven fabric with wide straps that tie at the shoulders, a concealed zip in the side and a wide flounce at the hem. Lined.
Knee-length dress in a fine knit with a slight sheen. Short cap sleeves, a seam at the waist, and a flared, pleated skirt. Unlined.
Top in soft faux shearling with a high collar, zip at the top, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Knee-high boots in imitation leather with square toes and high heels. Satin linings made from recycled polyester, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 9 cm.

Jacket in a stretch weave with notch lapels, a tapered waist and concealed buttons at the front. Flap front pockets, a chest pocket and an inner pocket with a button. Gently dropped, padded shoulders, long sleeves with slits at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Soft viscose lining. The polyester content of the jacket is recycled.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud and front pockets.
Wide pyjama shirt in an airy linen weave with a V-neck, collar, buttons at the top and long sleeves with narrow cuffs. Short slits in the sides.
Shirt jacket in sturdy jersey with a cutaway collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets, and press-studs at the cuffs.
Nightdress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline, short sleeves and slits in the sides.
Lace skirt with concealed elastication at the waist, a gathered seam at the hips and a scalloped, crocheted trim at the hem. Lined.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring jersey waistband, side pockets and rounded hems.
Espadrilles in cotton with a braided jute trim around the soles and concealed elastic at the back of the heels. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elastication around the top.
Dress with a soft jersey top, visible zip at the back and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist with a sewn-on bow and a lined, flared skirt in a patterned weave with a sheen.
Brazilian briefs in cotton with a mid, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knee-length pleated skirt in a patterned weave with a concealed zip in one side and asymmetric hem. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Blouse in an airy viscose weave with a V neck, small stand-up collar and smocking around the neckline. Long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

Short dress in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Relaxed fit with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and button. Gathered seam at the waist and a wide, softly draping skirt. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Blouse in an airy, printed weave with a V-neck, long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs and a seam at the waist with a peplum. Elastication at the back and ties at the front.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons at the top and long sleeves.

Suit trousers in a linen weave with an extended waistband with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Slim Fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to created a fitted silhouette.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a hood and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Top in a crinkled chiffon weave in a narrow, asymmetric cut at the top with wide shoulder straps, pleats at the front and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.

Fully lined swimsuit with a deep neckline at the back and adjustable shoulder straps. Padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and extra-high-cut legs with cutaway coverage at the back.
Hair clips in metal decorated with plastic beads. Length 5.5 cm.
Small weekend bag in woven fabric with a zip and two handles at the top, an adjustable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 12x35x42 cm.
Calf-length, V-neck dress in woven fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, buttons down the front, smocking at the back and a seam at the waist with a flared skirt. Lined.
Set with a top and tiered skirt in soft cotton jersey. Top with short puff sleeves and a print motif on the front. Skirt with an elastic waistband.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft cotton piqué with a collar and button placket.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing that holds in and shapes the waist and a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Shirt in airy cotton with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip and press-stud at one side. Unlined.
Fully lined shaping swimsuit for a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and seat. Triangular cups with removable inserts and wide straps that tie at the back of the neck. Lined gusset.

Long skirt in a patterned, softly draping Tencel™ lyocell and silk blend with a sheen. Wide, covered elastication at the waist and gathered tiers to create width and movement. Shorter underskirt in a viscose weave with a high slit at one side.

Trousers in a lightweight linen and viscose weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs. Jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Off-the-shoulder jumpsuit in a soft viscose weave with elastication and a wide flounce at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Jumper in a soft knit with a ribbed shawl collar and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey. Round neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Padded parka with a concealed zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, and a hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Handwarmer pockets with a press-stud, flap front pockets with press-studs and a zipped inner pocket. Partially concealed elastic tab with a button and inner ribbing at the cuffs, and a concealed, elasticated drawstring at the back of the waist. Lined.

Blouse in a mulberry silk weave with an opening at the top and an opening and button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with a pleat and buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Slightly shorter at the front with ties at the hem.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in double-weave organic cotton with covered elastication at the waist, a fake fly with buttons, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Ankle-length trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and slim legs.

Ankle-length joggers in woven fabric with elastication at the back of the waist. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Some of the polyester content of the joggers is recycled. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

Polo shirt in piqué made from a cotton blend with an appliqué and print motif on the chest. Ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves in a contrasting colour with striped ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and slightly wider, tapered legs.

Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck and short, wide sleeves with gathers at the shoulders. Seam at the waist with concealed elastication and a sewn-on tie belt, and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
Fitted top in soft, patterned jersey with short, flounced sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and press-studs at one side and at the crotch.
Wide, double-layered blouse in a plumeti weave with a stand-up collar and covered buttons down the back. Long flounced sleeves with elasticated cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Scarf in a softly draping, patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy cotton weave with decorative lacing at the top and wide sleeves with a seam. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem.
